By using Fire, Rock, and Dragon Gems the Red Flute increases the player's Egg Steps. == Details == Red Flute increases the player's Egg Steps by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%.
